title: Correct and unify Samarpan Trust office address across volunteer page and site

requirements.summary: Update /get-involved “Our Address” block to display the same office address used on Contact page and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: On /get-involved, the "Our Address" section no longer shows the old Bihar address lines and instead shows the address text: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311".
The updated address is visible in the UI without requiring authentication and matches the address shown on the Contact page and in the footer.

file_operations.description: Create a single exported office-address constant set to: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311", so the address can be reused consistently across pages.

Replace the current “Our Address” block content (the Bihar address lines) with the exact office address text: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311", preferably by importing and rendering the shared constant from frontend/src/constants/ngoContact.ts. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the Contact page address card uses the same shared office-address constant from frontend/src/constants/ngoContact.ts (no content changes beyond wiring to the constant). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the footer address line uses the same shared office-address constant from frontend/src/constants/ngoContact.ts (no content changes beyond wiring to the constant). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Remove/replace any remaining user-visible occurrences of the old Bihar address strings so they are not displayed anywhere on the site.
acceptanceCriteria: A site-wide search for the old address strings returns no user-visible occurrences in the built UI.
The only user-visible office address displayed across the site is consistent with: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311".

file_operations.description: Confirm the old address strings ("Vill-Bhagatpur, P.O-Bhagatpur", "P.S-Bhagatpur, Dist-Samastipur", "Bihar, India - 848503") are fully removed from the file and not rendered anywhere in /get-involved after the update. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Centralize any future address rendering to the shared office-address constant to prevent reintroduction of old address strings; verify no old address strings exist in this file.
